statements.sql: select `users`.*, `favourites`.`question_id` as `pivot_question_id`, `favourites`.`user_id` as `pivot_user_id`, `favourites`.`created_at` as `pivot_created_at`, `favourites`.`updated_at` as `pivot_updated_at` from `users` inner join `favourites` on `users`.`id` = `favourites`.`user_id` where `favourites`.`question_id` = 62
select count(*) as aggregate from `users` inner join `favourites` on `users`.`id` = `favourites`.`user_id` where `favourites`.`question_id` = 62 and `user_id` is null
